section_title: SUBSIDIARY BODY FOR SCIENTIFIC AND TECHNOLOGICAL ADVICE
sentences: SBSTA Chair Tibor Farago (Hungary) opened the third session by noting the deadlocked state of many SBSTA issues and expressing hope that the spirit of cooperation would prevail.

After a brief discussion during which VENEZUELA and KUWAIT suggested that a written report accompany SBSTA decisions, delegates adopted the provisional agenda for the session (FCCC/CP/1996/1/Annex I).
enb_long_title: Second Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
